Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit which is now flaking away in many places, the lower section of the exterior is grooved and the whole is covered with a light-brown slip, traces of both black- and red-painted texts survive.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394316) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394316)
